TopicTitle: SSTO Rocket that can land on inclined grounds.

Articles.Content:
Be Aware. This use mods. Mechjeb and edited Suspensatron (original DamnedRobotics)

Well, i'm making some studies, to be able to land on inclined grounds. This suspension are not automatic, but is kinda easy to level, before land, with mechjeb. And can be done without it too, by an skilled pilot.

I was tryind some aerobraking (because i'm know testing FAR systems), to make my rocket keep pointing in the righ direction on the way back. Not successful, yet.

Because is not a finished work, is just pics for now!

I hope you enjoy it.

My new SSTO Rocket is almost done. IT is working with FAR systems and MechJeb. It uses a variation of suspensatron (Damned Robotics original)

Today i test it with a Cloned Jebediah and the landing was perfect. (Congrats to Crew Manifest, i could clone the original Jebediah, using a part of his body. The original one was gone a long time ago.).
The damping system!
Oh! I saw you posting these pics on another thread! Too bad it isn't automatic, it would be useful to have landing legs with suspension

Oh! I saw you posting these pics on another thread! Too bad it isn't automatic, it would be useful to have landing legs with suspension

Yeah, i put as a suggestion, but in the mean time, this is working fine...

The hard is on the dark side, but if i put a light down, i can read the ground on time to made the adjustments.
